author: gstein
msg: Shift the upgrade code for conflicts out to format 14. Some open questions
have arisen, so we'll wait for a later format bump to deal with new
conflict handling. Format 13 will be primarily about the work queue.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc-metadata.sql:
(CONFLICT_VICTIM): move under a new format: 14 section
(format 14): renumber to format 99 until we decide to pull this in
* subversion/libsvn_wc/upgrade.c:
(conflict_action_to_word, conflict_reason_to_word,
wc_operation_to_word): reimplement using the token system and the
exported maps from the tree conflict code.
(bump13_baton): renamed to ...
(bump14_baton): ... this. future use for bumping to f14.
(bump_database_to_13): renamed to ...
(bump_database_to_14): ... this. future use for bumping to f14. store 14
into the schema version, when done.
(bump_to_13): renamed to ...
(bump_to_14): ... this. future use for bumping to f14.
(svn_wc__upgrade_sdb): wiggle around what needs to happen at the format
bumps. don't upgrade all the way to f14... just 13 when needed.

author: rhuijben
msg: Store the working copy context in the update editor and use it in a
few places to reduce the number of deprecation warnings.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(edit_baton): Add context variable.
(get_entry_url): Use node function to retrieve url.
(make_dir_baton, make_file_baton): Update caller.
(prep_directory): Make access baton directly on the context instead
of using the parent access baton.
(make_editor): Store context.

author: hwright
msg: Rename a couple of 'URL' variables to the more standard 'url'.  Also, populate
said variables directly from the working copy, rather than using an
entry as an intermediary.
* subversion/libsvn_client/switch.c
(svn_client__switch_internal): As above.
* subversion/libsvn_client/log.c
(svn_client_log5): Same.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(diff_repos_wc): Remove an entry retrieval by using the node url API.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/checkout.c
(svn_client__checkout_internal): Use the node url fetching API instead
of reading the url from an entry.
